name: Escuela de Aviación del Pacífico Ltda
about: Escuela de Aviación del Pacífico Ltda is a premier flight training institution authorized by the Unidad Administrativa Especial de la Aeronáutica Civil Colombiana, with a certification of operation since December 15, 2013. We offer comprehensive programs including the Piloto Comercial de Avión (PCA) and Técnico Mantenimiento de Aeronaves (TMA). Our curriculum is designed to equip students with the skills necessary for successful careers in aviation, whether as pilots, cabin crew, or maintenance technicians. With a focus on safety, quality instruction, and hands-on experience, we provide a holistic education that prepares our graduates for the demands of the aviation industry. Our commitment to excellence ensures that our students receive the best possible training to achieve their aviation goals.
services:

UAS EAP – UAS Pilot Certification Program
